content:
To create a new key-value "Flag" at HKLM\Software\Student and assign it a null-terminated value of "Now we're cooking with fire!", you can use the following command:

reg add HKLM\Software\Student /v Flag /t REG\_SZ /d "Now we're cooking with fire!" /f

Then run the binary at C:\Users\Offsec\Desktop\registry-exercises\registry01.exe to obtain the flag.

Note: You may need to run the command prompt as an administrator to make changes to the registry.
